import React, { useContext } from "react"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/ChecokoutSteps"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet-async"; import { Card, Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { ListGroup } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Store } from "../Store"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Button from "react-bootstrap"; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const {state, dispatch: ctxDispatch} = useContext(Store); const {cart, userInfo} = state; return
Preview Order

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}
